alert.note: Alert for Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:53PM PST until March 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST FRIDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Yakima Valley. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow amounts exceeding 4 inches will be possible approaching the lower slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascade Crest immediately west of Tieton and Naches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
